file_insights.changes_summary: Added responsive spacing and layout improvements to all Card components
key_modifications: Updated borderRadius values with responsive breakpoints (mobile-first approach)
Applied responsive padding (p) values across CardContent elements using breakpoint-aware objects
Added gap and flexWrap properties for responsive flex layouts
Implemented responsive font sizes for Typography components
Added responsive icon sizing and spacing
Enhanced text overflow handling with wordBreak and minWidth properties
Applied responsive height/width values to image and icon containers

patterns_discovered.description: All responsive values follow pattern: xs (mobile) → sm → md (desktop), ensuring graceful scaling
patterns_discovered.evidence: Properties like p: { xs: 1.5, sm: 2, md: 2.5 } and fontSize: { xs: '0.75rem', sm: '0.8rem' }

patterns_discovered.pattern: Flex layout improvements for small screens
patterns_discovered.description: Added flexWrap: { xs: 'wrap', sm: 'nowrap' } to prevent content overflow on mobile
patterns_discovered.evidence: Applied to Box containers in KPICard, ProjectCard for flexible text wrapping

patterns_discovered.description: SVG icons use responsive sizes via '& > svg': { fontSize: { xs, sm, md } }
patterns_discovered.evidence: Applied consistently in icon containers across multiple cards

patterns_discovered.description: Added minWidth: 0, flex: 1, and wordBreak: 'break-word' to prevent text squishing
patterns_discovered.evidence: Applied to typography sections that display dynamic content

patterns_discovered.description: Padding and margins scale proportionally: xs (compact) → sm/md (standard) → md (generous)
patterns_discovered.evidence: CardContent p values, gap properties, and margin-top adjustments throughout

gotchas_discovered.description: Changed default borderRadius from 12/16 to 8/12 (smaller), then increases on sm+ breakpoints
gotchas_discovered.impact: Ensures better fit on small screens while maintaining design quality on desktop

gotchas_discovered.description: Elements like status badges and metrics need flexShrink: 0 to prevent squishing when wrapped
gotchas_discovered.impact: Without this, responsive flex items could become unreadably small
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Added flexShrink: 0 and whiteSpace: 'nowrap' to prevent-collapse elements

gotchas_discovered.description: Icon padding and font-size must scale together to maintain visual balance
gotchas_discovered.impact: Mismatched scaling could make icons appear too small or padding too large
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Created paired responsive values: p: { xs: 0.75, sm: 1 } with fontSize sync

gotchas_discovered.description: Value text can overflow on small screens if not constrained
gotchas_discovered.impact: Large numbers could break layout or overflow container
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Added wordBreak: 'break-word' and responsive fontSize scaling

gotchas_discovered.description: Flex progress bar container needs minWidth: 0 to shrink properly on small screens
gotchas_discovered.impact: Without this, container won't shrink below content minimum width
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Added minWidth: 0 to parent Box of progress bar

approach_outcome.strategy: Systematic responsive design implementation using MUI breakpoints and mobile-first approach
execution: Applied responsive spacing (padding/margin) to all CardContent elements
Enhanced flex layouts with responsive wrapping and gaps
Scaled typography sizes progressively across breakpoints
Fixed text overflow and icon sizing issues with proper constraints
Maintained visual hierarchy while ensuring mobile usability
approach_outcome.completeness: All 5 card components updated with consistent responsive patterns
quality_indicators: No breaking changes - all modifications are additive and backward compatible
Consistent naming and pattern usage across all components
Proper use of theme.breakpoints for maintainability
Mobile-first approach ensures accessibility on smallest screens

recommendations.recommendation: Create a reusable responsive utility for common patterns like icon boxes
recommendations.rationale: Icon box pattern (responsive width/height, padding, svg fontSize) repeats in KPICard and FeatureCard
recommendations.implementation: Export a styled component or hook for consistent icon sizing across app

recommendations.recommendation: Document the responsive spacing scale used (xs: 1.5, sm: 2, md: 2.5)
recommendations.rationale: Ensures consistency across future card implementations and other components
recommendations.implementation: Add to MUI theme configuration or component guidelines

recommendations.recommendation: Add responsive visual regression tests at key breakpoints
recommendations.rationale: Multiple responsive values create more edge cases to test
recommendations.implementation: Screenshot tests at xs (320px), sm (600px), md (960px) breakpoints

recommendations.recommendation: Consider using CSS media query optimization in production builds
recommendations.rationale: Multiple responsive values increase CSS output size slightly
recommendations.implementation: Profile CSS bundle size and optimize if needed

recommendations.recommendation: Verify line-height adjustments maintain readability at smallest font sizes
recommendations.rationale: Smaller fonts (0.625rem, 0.75rem) on mobile need careful spacing
recommendations.implementation: Test with accessibility tools and user feedback on mobile devices
